---
name: Question about using Wrench/Saashq/Saashq Apps
about: This is not the appropriate channel
labels: invalid
---

Please post on our forums:

for questions about using `wrench`, probably the best place to start is the [wrench repo](https://github.com/saashqdev/wrench) or [wrench intro](https://saashq.org/wrench) or [wrench docs](https://saashq.org/docs/wrench)

for questions about using the `Saashq Framework`: ~~https://discuss.saashq.org~~ => [stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/saashq) tagged under `saashq`

for questions about using `ERPNexus`: https://discuss.erpnexus.com

For documentation issues, use the [Saashq Framework Documentation](https://saashq.org/docs/user/en) or the [developer cheetsheet](https://github.com/saashqdev/shq-framework/wiki/Developer-Cheatsheet)

For a slightly outdated yet informative developer guide: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3lFfCEoMxvzHtsZHFJ4T3n5yMM3nGJ1W

> **Posts that are not bug reports or feature requests will not be addressed on this issue tracker.**
